titleStmt.title: Thomas Sadler to James W. Tate
CWG7907

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
THOS. SADLER,
Counsellor at Law, Notary Public & Commissioner of Deeds,
FOR NEW YORK, MASSACHUSETTS AND OTHER STATES,
OFFICE, No. 11 WALL STREET,
NEW-YORK.
March 9. 1863.
Hon: J. W. Tate
Dear Sir:
I have your favor of 19th ulto. Enclosing Commission, for which I ask you to accept my thanks.
Herewith please find affidavit and oath of office, and $5 fees --
Command me when an opportunity offers to serve you or your friends, and Believe me
